title: BRIEF-China Education Group Holdings Says Unit To Acquire Aspen Higher Education For A$128 Mln
text:
BRIEF-China Education Group Holdings Says Unit To Acquire Aspen Higher Education For A$128 Mln

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 21:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-China Education Group Holdings Says Unit To Acquire Aspen Higher Education For A$128 Mln Sept 23 (Reuters) - China Education Group Holdings Ltd : * UNIT AGREED TO ACQUIRE ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF ASPEN HIGHER EDUCATION FROM VISS HOLDINGS AT AUD128 MILLION
